alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 2:48PM CDT until March 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sherman County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions. Affected routes include Interstate 70 and Highway 27. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to moderate snow, heavy at times, has moved into Sherman County. Poor visibility and slippery snow covered roadways have been reported.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If you can delay travel, do so as poor travel conditions have been reported. This same band of snow led to several accidents in east Colorado and conditions could rapidly deteriorate in Sherman County. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
